header.title: Coalition Leadership
header.description: Meet the dedicated community leaders who volunteer their time and expertise to guide Murray Partners 4 Prevention.

officers.sectionDescription: Our leadership team provides strategic direction and governance.

members.name: Sheri Van Bibber
members.title: Coalition Chair
members.subtitle: Leadership
members.bio: Leading the Murray Partners 4 Prevention coalition like a rockstar

members.name: Vice Chair
members.title: Vice Chair
members.subtitle: Operations
members.bio: Supporting coalition leadership and overseeing day-to-day operations and community outreach programs.

members.name: Secretary
members.title: Secretary
members.subtitle: Communications
members.bio: Managing coalition communications, meeting minutes, and community correspondence.

members.name: Treasurer
members.title: Treasurer
members.subtitle: Finance
members.bio: Overseeing coalition finances and ensuring responsible stewardship of community resources.

members.sectionDescription: Representatives from our partner organizations working together for Murray.

members.name: Member Representative
members.title: Community Representative
members.bio: Representing public health initiatives and tobacco prevention programs.

members.name: Member Representative
members.title: Education Representative
members.bio: Advocating for student safety and youth empowerment programs.

members.name: Member Representative
members.title: City Representative
members.bio: Coordinating city resources and community development initiatives.

members.name: Member Representative
members.title: Healthcare Representative
members.bio: Supporting community health and wellness programs.

members.name: Member Representative
members.title: Business Representative
members.bio: Connecting local businesses with community prevention initiatives.

members.name: Member Representative
members.title: Youth Representative
members.bio: Representing youth voices and student leadership development.

cta.title: Interested in Joining?
cta.description: We welcome new members and partner organizations. Contact us to learn about opportunities to join the coalition and make a difference in Murray.
